TMMC_data.note: if lnPi is not given for a (N0', N1') pair, then its value is set to -infinity

contents.rho (mol/l): density of fluid at specified conditions in mol/l
contents.rho_unc (mol/l): uncertainty of density, based on 95% confidence interval
contents.lnZ_N2: logarithm of activity of n2, where z has units of inverse ANG^3
contents.lnZ_N2_unc: uncertainty of lnZ_N2, based on 95% confidence interval
contents.lnZ_CO2: logarithm of activity of co22, where z has units of inverse ANG^3
contents.lnZ_CO2_unc: uncertainty of lnZ_CO2, based on 95% confidence interval
